p: TVBN had a significant increase (p<0.05) in all groups. The least TVBN (25.14±0.28) belonged to ZEO 0.5% group on the 9 th day of storage at 7°C, but the control group had the highest one (34.79±0.35) ( Table-3). PV value had a significant increase in all groups from the 3 rd day of storage. However, it had the least increase in ZEO 0.5% and MEO 0.5% treatment groups ( Table-4).
